entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
AREAS OF FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
AREAS OF FOG IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
